title: Fractional Head of AI
bio: Nadaa Taiyab is a Fractional Head of AI who helps organizations identify high value use cases and lead AI initiatives from concept to production. For nearly a decade, she has built applied AI across national health systems, including clinical and operational workflows and large scale patient data de-identification (U.S. patent). She has also partnered with the Institute for Systems Biology on research to identify patients impacted by adverse social determinants of health. Most recently, she led AI at a healthcare startup, building HIPAA compliant voice agents to automate referral workflows and reduce call center wait times. With experience spanning Goldman Sachs, the World Bank, and health tech startups across three continents, she brings a global perspective and a knack for making complex topics accessible as a speaker and mentor.
